resources.string: *If you face any sort of problem related to app font size, it is due to device Font settings. Kindly adjust your settings and restart the app, for a smoother experience.
*Scroll down for more info (if required due to font size issues)

To scan the QR code, simply open the application and align the code. It will automatically recognize any given QR-code/Barcode. After scanning the code, copy the text/link and use it where ever you want.

Key features:
 ‚Ä¢ QR code and barcode all supported.
 ‚Ä¢ Flashlight supported for low-light environments.
 ‚Ä¢ Auto Focus feature available for better detection.
 ‚Ä¢ Tap for instant extreme fast focus.
*Scroll down to see all supported formats
Your QR code will appear here at top
*Please don\'t insert any sort of emoji
**If any new line is given in while coding the text, while decoding it may or may-not be present, depending on the decoding application!
Enter the text/link for your QR Code
Welcome To QR Code Scanner and Generator

Please retry scanning, again, if you are using for the first time, after opening the application.
In the second attempt it is resolved.
Ignore Otherwise!
‚Ä¢ Tap for instant extreme-fast focus.
The Best QR Code Scanner and Generator App

\"Hello there! If you enjoy the content I create or find my assistance helpful, please consider buying me a coffee. Your support will not only help me stay fueled and motivated but also enables me to continue producing valuable and insightful information. Every cup of coffee contributes to my ongoing efforts to share knowledge and make a positive impact. Your generosity is greatly appreciated, and together, we can make a difference. \nThank you for being a part of this journey!\"
